title: Greg Bluestein: "Flipped"
description: Michael talks with Atlanta Journal Constitution Reporter Greg Bluestein, author of "Flipped: How Georgia Turned Purple and Broke the Monopoly on Republican Power." Original air date 24 March 2022. The book was published on 22 March 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Greg Bluestein)
